DOC.brief_summary: This study is looking at new ways to stretch knee contractures in children with cerebral palsy using a specially designed splint.
DOC.brief_title: A Comparative Study of the Effectiveness of Treatment of Contractures With Mechanically Applied Stretch and Heat.
DOC.detailed_description: When using active orthoses to treat contractures, is the effectiveness of treatment improved by heating the contracted tissue prior to treatment?
DOC.criteria: children with cerebral palsy absent thermal sensation
